EmailTemplate.subject: What do consumers expect from their bank today?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Last year changed the face of banking forever. Consumer adoption of digital banking accelerated exponentially and customer experience has become the name of the game. Consumers expect great, consistent experiences across whichever channel they choose to bank. So, with consumer expectations and trends continually shifting, Wells Fargo must prepare for the future and put the customer front and center. But where to start?
